bug.author: baiyizhangweifeng
bug.summary: An errors on running the exampleï¼šValueError: Please initialize `Prune` with a supported layer. Layers should either be a `PrunableLayer` instance, or should be supported by the PruneRegistry. You passed: <class 'tensorflow.python.keras.layers.recurrent.LSTM'>
bug.description: When I run the sample code in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/model-optimization/blob/master/tensorflow_model_optimization/python/examples/sparsity/keras/imdb/imdb_lstm.py>https://github.com/tensorflow/model-optimization/blob/master/tensorflow_model_optimization/python/examples/sparsity/keras/imdb/imdb_lstm.py</denchmark-link> . There was an errors,could you help me. Thank you very much.

comments.comment: This will be fixed in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/model-optimization/pull/414>#414</denchmark-link> by <denchmark-link:https://github.com/psunn>@psunn</denchmark-link> and be merged soon. After it's merged, free to reopen if you continue to face the same issue.
